casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Elton Ozell McLAUGHLIN. No. 637A84-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. J. Kirk Osborn, Chapel Hill, Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for McLaughlin. Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 17th day of September 2003 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Bladen County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
